query:
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.role, ap.id as perm_id, ap.balanceManagement, ap.userManagement
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN adminPermissions ap ON u.id = ap.userId 
WHERE u.role = 'staff_admin';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user XTqR3P9v8tSgKnm.root --database jHCPjtWAoWrQh3F8kPBEFC --execute 
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.role, ap.id as perm_id, ap.balanceManagement, ap.userManagement
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN adminPermissions ap ON u.id = ap.userId 
WHERE u.role = 'staff_admin';
